	BufferedImage grayImage = new BufferedImage(width, height, BufferedImage.TYPE_BYTE_GRAY);
	for (int i = 0; i < width; i++) {

			int rgb = bf.getRGB(i, j);
			grayImage.setRGB(i, j, rgb);
